meanings: line one's own pockets with public funds

vlive.korean: 너 공금으로 니 옷 사려고 1번 한 거지! You chose number one so that you can buy clothes with the group funds! 듣기 View video WHYNOT TV : 여자 셋이 살면 생기는 일? [미스콤플렉스] Prologue
vlive.english: You chose number one so that you can buy clothes with the group funds!

vlive.korean: 내 생각에는 공금이 나쁘지 않은 것 같아. I think penalty is a good idea. 듣기 View video WINNER : 승승TV Ep.7 <송구영신년회>
vlive.english: I think penalty is a good idea.

vlive.korean: 안 되면 회사 공금이라도 털지, 뭐. 법인카드 긁을게요. I can borrow from the company. I'll use their credit card. 듣기 View video Park Si Hwan : birthday...thirty..day..'ㅂ'
vlive.english: I can borrow from the company. I'll use their credit card.

vlive.korean: [공금으로 즐기는 여유로운 티타임] 산 김에 케이크이라도 하나 사 갈까? [Spent the team fund for a coffee break] Shall we get some cake for them? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [MONSTA X] 몬스타엑스 - 출.없.방 #01
vlive.english: [Spent the team fund for a coffee break] Shall we get some cake for them?

examples.korean: official funds 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공금. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
He was found guilty of embezzling $150000 of public funds. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 공금 15만 달러를 횡령한 것으로 유죄 선고를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was found guilty of embezzling $150000 of public funds. Add to Wordbook
